root.name: Reggie Jackson Baseball
root.description: Baseball FieldThe game included a feature in which the color of the grass was randomily selected whenever the reset button was selected. Red,Green and YellowRed GrassGreen GrassYellow GrassNot only was the color of grass unique, the game also throws in various animations to field that doesn't effect the gameplay such as cheerleaders, mascots dancing, relief pitchers warming up and base coaches just standing around.
